title: Dairy/Sugar Free Orange Creamsicles
directions: Pour all the ingredients into a blender and process on high until slightly frothy. Pour into popsicle molds and freeze overnight.
ingredients: 1 1/4 cup of Heavy coconut cream from a can
2 Tbsp of frozen Orange Juice Concentrate
2-3 Packets of stevia to taste (2-3 grams)
Food Coloring Natural or Regular, to give them that classic orange color (optional)
